website_summaries.verdict: Solid brass trumpet that's designed for beginners and comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Classic trumpet with a gold finish
Delivers decent sound that will encourage novices as they learn to play
Includes a well-made case, cleaning cloth, mouthpiece and gloves
Also available in black and nickel-plated
cons: The sound of pricier trumpets is somewhat deeper, but this is a minor concern that won't bother most beginners

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Trumpet for Beginners and even Intermediate Players
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this trumpet for my son, who is in the advanced band at school. It was a Christmas gift, and he loved it. The nickel plating on this instrument is extremely shiny and looks very sharp and clean. The slides are smooth to move and the valves are pre-oiled. The sound it produces is also clean and crisp. Not the sound quality of a Bach or a Conn-Selmer, but it is very good for this price range. I recommend this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Bklyn718

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners, not the best if you’re a serious player
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing trumpet for about 8 years and when my nice one broke I needed a replacement for marching band fast and i settled on this one. It looks very nice however it’s obviously not as dark and full sound you’d see from an name brand trumpet, however, I feel it would be great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very nice sound and case. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: DeluxeDiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter already plays clarinet and decided she wanted to also learn trumpet for marching band. Rather than renting we went this route to see how she liked it. She hasn't had any issues and is happy with the sound. Hoping it gets her by until we can purchase something in a few years for college marching band.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great trumpet for those beginning band.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner's trumpet and a great price too because they cost way more to rent in the long run AND if your child really doesn't like it, you can resell it too. The case is really nice and quality stuff. We have had no issues with the trumpet at all and the teacher said it sounds great. We will probably upgrade her IF she decides to continue on with it. For anyone with a child / teen, this is a great option to avoid the high rental costs or to avoid borrowing a previously used one because who wants to do that these days? Not us!
customer_reviews.author: Caz H.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter very surprised
customer_reviews.text: This is very nice, sounds good. Hopefully the music teacher will accept this instrument. Our granddaughter is just beginning, she is very excited, and when she plays, it sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great! great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for beginners band in middle school. Great value! Works well! I think this is perfect for a beginning stage and if he sticks to it, we can talk about upgrading.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Raiford

customer_reviews.title: The price.
customer_reviews.text: I am a band teacher and the students could not get the instruments out of the school. They went home on a Thursday and did not realize it was the last day of school so I have purchased 15 instruments so students can practice. The price is great. I have not seen the instruments.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for my beginner band player. Bought this as a christmas gift and he absolutely loves it. Comes with a sturdy case alo.
customer_reviews.author: Reta Fields

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product my grandson loved the trumpet using for his school lesson why rent when you can buy a nice one for less .
customer_reviews.author: BuffaloBill

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality for the price paid very happy with the trumpet! and I’m not just blowing my horn!!! I would buy this again. The case is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Van Novak

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd beginner trumpet I have bought this is a very good price mark for a beginner band student all the way to marching band. I am very satisfied and happy with the trumpet and case is very nice too!!!
customer_reviews.author: candie mcwhorter

customer_reviews.title: Bad valve.
customer_reviews.text: First valve continues to stick and is not working properly
customer_reviews.author: Linzee Perry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled and thought it better than the school trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids band
customer_reviews.text: The reason I didn't give it five stars is because I purchased two of these and one of them was hard to use. I don't know the name of the piece but one of my daughters claimed that the piece was so difficult to use and it would hurt her pinky everytime she used it. We tried to fix it but not much luck. She has a higher quality trumpet that she uses. And in comparison of the two I can tell the sound difference. My other daughter's trumpet came in good and easy to use. So I guess it is hit or miss. But the sound quality is okay for students but not necessarily for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound for beginners! My 6th grade child loves her trumpet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter trumpet for somebody looking to have fun with music
customer_reviews.text: I find the trumpet one of the easiest wind instruments to get a good tone out of and this is no exception. I played for about a year in highschool and coming back to it felt like riding a bicycle. It comes with everything you need to get going. The included case feels sturdy enough to be dropped without much worry. The metalwork was perfect. Didn't see any imperfections. The valves didn't stick or lag at all while I've been playing it. The important thing, sound quality seemed fantastic for a trumpet in this price bracket. I would highly recommend this to any student of music, young or old.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Plays nice with a nice tone.
customer_reviews.text: I've been playing a trumpet off and on since I was in 4th grade (I'm now over 50). I haven't had a trumpet to play in a few years and found myself missing it very much. While this trumpet is in no way a professional trumpet, it is a very nice quality student, beginner, trumpet. I've had a lot of fun picking the trumpet back up and playing again. The valves work nice and smooth and it even came with valve oil. Overall, I'm not disappointed in this trumpet at all. It's decent quality and nice sound for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda OK

customer_reviews.title: Easy Beginner Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner trumpet, it plays well out of the box and it was easy to learn the basics from Youtube videos. My daughter plays the flute and wanted to learn another instrument, so this was a good way to go!
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

product_meta.title: EastRock Gold Trumpet Brass Standard Bb Trumpet Set for Beginner, Student with Hard Case, Gloves, 7C Mouthpiece,Trumpet Cleaning Kit-Lacquer Gold
feature_bullets: Timbre: Eastrock Trumpet’s sound is excellent and bright, penetrating, abundant and powerful, excellent vibration.
Design and Crafts: Solid yellow brass body; rose brass lead-pipe; cupronickel tuning slides, The bell mouth adopts an integrated welding technology.
Valve: The valve is durable, Spring rebounds quickly Good air tightness,There is resistance when pulling out the adjusting tubes, and the water key has good air tightness.
Suitable: The tone of trumpet is the popular Bb tone, which is suitable for both beginner and experts, such as students, music fans, band performance and so on.
WHAT IF I DON'T LIKE THE TRUMPET ANYMORE?-If you for ANY reason don't like the trumpet, Simply just Contact us within one year for a FULL REFUND.
